title: Process a Listing Cancellation
description: A seller has decided not to sell their home and wants to cancel the listing agreement.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the seller's request and review the cancellation clause in the signed listing agreement.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reviews the contract for any terms related to early cancellation.

tasks.description: Generate the official listing cancellation form.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates the correct legal form for cancellation.

tasks.description: Send the cancellation form to the seller for signature and then update the listing status in the MLS to 'Cancelled'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent completes the cancellation process and updates the MLS.
